Description:
SNC-Lavalin has an exciting full-time career opportunity for a Senior Mechanical Engineer with minimum 15 years’ experience. Candidates having relevant project experience with transmission & distribution lines, substations, power stations are preferred. The role is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.The candidate will work in a fast-paced consulting environment with excellent career growth opportunities.ResponsibilitiesWorking in collaboration with the Mechanical team to prepare the following deliverables / provide the following engineering services (non-exhaustive list):Development of technical specifications.
Development of conceptual and detail designs.
Design of interfaces with protection and control systems, civil works, structures, etc.
Preparation of bid documents and bid evaluations.
Design review of detail design performed by O.E.M. and third-party detail design.
Ensure interdisciplinary coordination.
Take part in audits and technical assessment.
Construction supervision; development of installation procedures and method statements.
Commissioning supervision.
Witnessing factory testing.
Feasibility and techno-economic studies.
Design studies and calculations.RequirementsBachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, from a recognized institution.
Minimum 15 years of relevant experience, particularly related to power systems, transmission & distribution lines, substations, power stations projects.
Exceptional academic and professional record.
Exceptional problem-solving and analytical capabilities with a focus achieving results.
Team player with great interpersonal, communication and presentation skills.
Client focused, highly autonomous, and ability to work under pressure.
Eligibility for registration with a Professional Order of Engineers.
Availability for short trips to construction sites, factories, client’s offices, in Canada, international and overseas.
Fluency in English language, both spoken and written. Additional languages will be considered an asset.SNC-Lavalin Projects and O&M Services is a business unit of SNC-Lavalin Group.  We provide a full range of project management, programme management, construction management, engineering services, consulting services and operation and maintenance services across the MENA region.  Active in the Middle East for over 40 years, we have offices in the Saudi Arabia, UAE, Qatar, Oman, and Egypt. for transportation and other infrastructure programmes.Founded in 1911, SNC-Lavalin is a global fully integrated professional services and project management company and a major player in the ownership of infrastructure. From offices around the world, SNC-Lavalin's employees are proud to build what matters. Our teams provide comprehensive end-to-end project solutions – including PPP, capital investment, consulting, design, engineering, construction, sustaining capital and operations and maintenance to international clients.
